dataCsv.Site_Description: The hull of the Langham is relatively intact except where the fire burned through the hull exposing the cross -strapping. It is a great model to study hull construction. The weather deck is gone but the main deck is still intact. The machinery on site includes a triple expansion steam engine, twin Scotch boilers with plenum, capstan, deck winch windlass and two anchors, rudder, propeller, center stanchions, and bitts.
